sentences.en: Her repertory was vast and to her it seemed that each song told some part of her life.
sentences.cn: 她演唱的歌曲有很多，并且对于她来说似乎每一首歌都讲述了她的一部分生活。

sentences.en: I once stage - managed a repertory theatre.
sentences.cn: 以前我曾在一专用剧场担任保留剧目的舞台总监.

sentences.en: Jane weighed down her repertory with these plays.
sentences.cn: 简加上这几出戏,使她的演出剧目得到了加强.

sentences.en: Mary weighed down her repertory with these plays.
sentences.cn: 玛丽加上了这几出戏,使她的演出剧目得到了加强.

sentences.en: Population and vaccine repertory influence each other and co - evolve so that they accelerate convergence to optimum.
sentences.cn: 种群与疫苗库相互作用、协同进化,极大地提高了算法的收敛速度.

sentences.en: The authors contend that reason lies in absence of the definition and measurement methodology repertory.
sentences.cn: 这种现象的主要原因在于国内在战略变革的定义与测量方法论上储备不足.

sentences.en: The Hong Kong Repertory Theatre staged six productions in 84 performances in 1997, attracting 52423 people.
sentences.cn: 在一九九七年,香港话剧团推出了6出剧作,合共演出84场, 吸引观众达52423人次.

sentences.en: The Pathetic ranks with the four enduring favorites of the repertory.
sentences.cn: 《悲怆交响曲》是节目中持久不衰地受到人们喜爱的三四部作品之一.

sentences.en: The repertory company revived plays from 30 years ago.
sentences.cn: 该保留剧目轮演剧团重演30年以前的戏剧.

words.tran_cn: 全部节目；计算机指令系统；（美）某人或机器的全部技能

trans.tran_cn: 仓库，贮藏所，（尤指知识等的）贮藏，搜集，贮藏物，全部剧目
